bibl.title: Per un nuovo testo di Sapph. fr. 2 V.
bibl.note: P.S.I. XIII, 1300 (= M.-P.3 1439; LDAB 3904). - Postulates that l. 1 of fr. 2 V. is not the first line of the poem, and proposes a new text (with Italian translation). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Stefano Caciagli, Per un nuovo testo di Sapph. fr. 2 V.
P.S.I. XIII, 1300 (= M.-P.3 1439; LDAB 3904). - Postulates that l. 1 of fr. 2 V. is not the first line of the poem, and proposes a new text (with Italian translation). - Avec résumé en anglais.
